title: There's Been An Incident

description:
It was an accident...

***

Written by AM_Hathazard (read more at r/HazardousImaginings) and narrated by Danielle Hewitt

***

Content warning: Domestic Abuse, Child Death

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
